# GCC, MinGW components, libs and so on
http://mingw-w64.org
https://gcc.gnu.org/
All licenced GPL, see LICENCE.txt for more information

# gl3w
https://github.com/skaslev/gl3w/
gl3w is public domain software. Praise the authors!

# cpp-httplib
https://github.com/yhirose/cpp-httplib
Copyright (c) 2017 yhirose
cpp-httplib is licensed under the MIT License, see LICENSE.httplib.txt for more information.

# fmt
https://github.com/fmtlib/fmt
Copyright (c) 2012 - present, Victor Zverovich
cpp-httplib is licensed under the MIT License, see LICENSE.fmt.txt for more information.

# ImGui
https://github.com/ocornut/imgui
Copyright (c) 2014-2020 Omar Cornut
Dear ImGui is licensed under the MIT License, see LICENSE.imgui.txt for more information.

# nativefiledialog
https://github.com/mlabbe/nativefiledialog
nativefiledialog is licensed under the ZLIB Licence. See LICENSE.nativefiledialog.txt

# OpenSSL
https://www.openssl.org/
See LICENCE.openssl.txt for more information

# JSON for Modern C++
https://github.com/nlohmann/json
Copyright (c) 2013-2020 Niels Lohmann
JSON for Modern C++  is licensed under the MIT License, see LICENSE.json.txt for more information.

https://gist.github.com/h0tw1r3/51084def72c9765a5d12
